DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy safety ASC-01 ( aripiprazole/sertraline combination ) compare sertraline monotherapy patient major depressive disorder respond incompletely sertraline monotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Assess Efficacy Safety ASC-01 Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Patients either inpatient outpatient . Patients able understand necessary information give consent undergo examination , observation , evaluation specify clinical protocol , able give write consent base full understanding trial . Patients give diagnosis `` Major Depressive Disorder , Single Episode '' `` Major Depressive Disorder , Recurrent '' accord DSM5 current episode major depression continue least 8 week Patients HAMD 17 total score 18 Screening Period evaluation Female patient childbearing potential wish become pregnant trial period within 4 week completion discontinuation trial Pregnant breastfeed female patient , female patient may pregnant Patients judge intolerant antidepressant ( include drug use current episode major depression ) base treatment history Patients electroconvulsive therapy Patients enrol clinical trial drug medical device within 1 month time informed consent Patients medical history suggest risk develop serious adverse event symptom may hinder efficacy/safety evaluation ( eg , symptoms fibromyalgia , premenstrual syndrome etc overlap depressive symptom ) Patients complication history diabetes mellitus , patient judge diabetic fasting blood glucose level ≥ 126 mg/dL 2hour glucose level 75g oral glucose tolerance test ( OGTT ) ≥ 200 mg/dL nonfasting blood glucose level ≥ 200 mg/dL HbA1c [ NGSP level ] ≥ 6.5 % Patients undergoing treatment thyroid disease ( except patient whose disease stabilize drug therapy 3 month long time informed consent ) Patients history neuroleptic malignant syndrome serotonin syndrome Patients history seizure disorder ( eg , epilepsy )
